panels.description:
A running list of RDO jobs that are in the  openstack-periodic-24hr openstack-periodic-latest-released zuul pipelines.

NOTE: this does *not* necessarily mean the jobs here listed here are also  in the promotion criteria. 

Use the links below to see the RDO zuul builds or the promotion criteria.
